mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(company_name, company_picture, company_email, company_phone_number, company_address, created_at) VALUES(#{companyName}, #{companyPicture}, #{companyEmail}, #{companyPhoneNumber}, #{companyAddress}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.users_id, u.login_id, u.login_password, c.company_name, c.company_id, c.company_phone_number, c.company_email, c.company_picture, c.company_address FROM company c LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON c.company_id = u.company_id WHERE c.company_id =#{companyId}

SELECT company_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(company_address,',',1),',',-1) AS zonecode, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(company_address,',',2),',',-1) AS road_jibunAddr, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(company_address,',',3),',',-1) AS detail_address FROM company WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name = #{companyName}, company_picture = #{companyPicture}, company_email = #{companyEmail}, company_phone_number =#{companyPhoneNumber}, company_address = #{companyAddress} WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
